channel.title: Analysis on AI Challenge Watch
channel.description: Recent content in Analysis on AI Challenge Watch

item.title: Welcome to AI Challenge Watch
item.description: In 2025, lawmakers across all 50 states introduced over 1,200 AI-related bills, with 145 enacted into law. According to the National Conference of State Legislatures, 38 states adopted AI-related measures in 2025. These laws represent the primary regulatory framework for AI in the United States, as Congress has not passed comprehensive federal AI legislation. Some, or many, of these laws may be flawed, particularly on First Amendment grounds, since AI produces content that can be considered speech.
